/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faMoon, faMapMarkerAlt, faArrowUp, faArrowDown } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import './RightSide.css'; import './SortIcon.css'; const RightSide = (props) => { return (
{/* NavBar */}

Today

Week

°C
{/* NavBar */}
{/* 7 Days Forecast */}
{props.day0}
{`${Math.round(props.temp0)}°`}
{props.day1}
{`${Math.round(props.temp1)}°`}
{props.day2}
{`${Math.round(props.temp2)}°`}
{props.day3}
{`${Math.round(props.temp3)}°`}
{props.day4}
{`${Math.round(props.temp4)}°`}
{props.day5}
{`${Math.round(props.temp5)}°`}
{props.day6}
{`${Math.round(props.temp6)}°`}
{props.day7}
{`${Math.round(props.temp7)}°`}
{/* 7 Days Forecast */} {/* Today's Highlights */}

Today's Highlights

UV Index

{props.uvi}

Wind Speed

{props.windSpeed} km/h

WSW

Sunrise & Sunset

{props.sunrise}

{props.sunset}

Humidity

{`${props.humidity}%`}

{props.humidity >= 40 && props.humidity <= 60 ? "Normal" : "Unhealthy"} {props.humidity >= 40 && props.humidity <= 60 ? "👍" : '👎'}

Visibility

{props.visibility} km

Average 🙁

Wind Degree

{props.windDeg}

Unhealthy 👎
{/* Today's Highlights */}
) } export default RightSide;
